QueryResult.text: select f.id FILE_ID , f.name NAME , u.id USER_ID , max(h.last_updated_date) ACCESSED_DATE, u.first_name ACCESSED_BY_FIRST_NAME , u.last_name ACCESSED_BY_LAST_NAME from clb_dms_files f , clb_dms_versions v , cmn_sec_users u , clb_dms_histories h where f.id = v.file_id and v.id = h.version_id and h.last_updated_by = u.id group by f.id, f.name,u.id, u.first_name, u.last_name
